long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WebMakeover is a user-friendly extension that empowers you to personalize your browsing experience. With just a few clicks, you can alter the font size, line spacing, zoom level, background color, and text color of any webpage. Our real-time preview feature allows you to see your changes instantly, making customization easier than ever before. Whether you're looking to reduce eye strain, improve readability, or just make the web match your personal style, WebMakeover has got you covered. Give your web browsing a makeover today with WebMakeover!
